amendment.description: To limit the availability of amounts authorized to be appropriated for overseas contingency operations pending relief from the spending limits under the Budget Control Act of 2011.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1521 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 205.

action.text: Amendment SA 1521 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3657; text: CR S3657) To limit the availability of amounts authorized to be appropriated for overseas contingency operations pending relief from the spending limits under the Budget Control Act of 2011.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1521 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 205.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1521 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 205.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1521 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1463.
